channel.title: Black Flag Nightless-The Clock Struck Midnight-English Victory
channel.description:
**Hon hon mah fellow baguette eating pirates! Today we finally purge those English pig dogs hiding on our ship! Well unless they have us beat then we do what any honorable French sailors do. Surrender!**
# Welcome to Black Flag Nightless! *Hosted By Captain Kai, Co-Hosted by First Mate ???* # Rules 1. Follow Global Forum Rules 2. Do not game throw (Game throwing is an action where you purposefully and willfully harm your team's chances of winning 3. Hate will not be tolerated. Though this is a global forum rule I wish to make that explicitly clear. 4. Don't like posts if you are dead 5. Don't pretend to be dead, if you haven't posted in 36 hours you will receive a prod, if you aren't responding after that you will be subbed out. 6. Don't edit or delete made posts. 7. Have a good ole time aight?
# Mechanics Days are 48 hours Nights? Nah fuck that. WE DONT SLEEP This is a nightless game, as such there is no night. It’s also a Black Flag game. Which means when the Mafia (English) reach one member they auto concede giving the town the win. However when the Town (French) reaches 3 members they will auto concede.
For additional reading on the Black Flag mechanic please refer to this link https://wiki.mafiascum.net/index.php?title=Black_Flag_Nightless # Role List
**[color=blue]7 French Sailors[/color]**
**[color=red]3 English Sailors [/color]**
# Role Cards
> [color=blue] **French Sailor** [/color] > You are a honorable French Sailor. >You have no powers other than your vote/voice. > *See the English reduced to 1 member*
>[color=red]**English Sailor**[/color] > You are a despicable English ~~Pig Dog~~ Sailor >You have a daychat with your fellow English Sailors >*See the French reduced to 3 members *
# Sign Ups 1. Htm 2. Dat Birb
3. ~~PKR~~ [color=red] English Sailor [/color]
4. ~~Andrej~~ [color=blue] French Sailor [/color]
5. JakeTheWolfe
6. Magnus
7. Marshal
8. WazzaAzza
9. ~~Geyde~~ -> ~~Maxwell~~ [color=blue] French Sailor [/color]
10. Eevee

item.title: Black Flag Nightless-The Clock Struck Midnight-English Victory
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
Ami:

Anyways, I am very much tempted to call this a no-contest due to the sheer amount of replacements, if which didn’t happen town easily could have won the game. Scum still played very well which I commend them on. However I would have liked to see them take more advantage of the daychat that they were given.

You may now post

That’s not how no contest work

Read full topic

should have asked to clarify for this case. This game was not the one to sub in

item.description:

Me going on vacations is one thing, but if you ask me to stop trolling and gamesolve, at least just do listen afterwards.
